featured.text: The company is _____ and making great profits under the wise leadership of the chief executive officer.
The profits of Prince Charles’s organic farm go to _____ to help the poor and the sick.
Rather it is PBS, Public Broadcasting System, a non-profit public broadcasting TV service.
They are shrinking in number because they make no profits.

other.text: The non-profit organization has _____ $1 million over five years to finance the construction of the medical center.
Many teenagers make a lot of profits in the fashion market today.

definition.zh_def: 利潤，指收入超過成本的部分。
definition.en_def: The financial gain obtained when the revenue from sales exceeds the costs associated with producing and selling goods or services.
definition.example: The company reported a significant profit this quarter.
